events.name: CampaignCreated
events.description: Signals the initiation of a new marketing campaign.

events.name: CampaignLaunched
events.description: Represents the official launch of a marketing campaign.

events.name: CampaignEnded
events.description: Indicates the conclusion of a marketing campaign.

events.name: AdCreated
events.description: Denotes the creation of a new advertisement for campaigns.

events.name: AdPublished
events.description: Marks the publication of an advertisement.

events.name: LeadGenerated
events.description: Represents the generation of a potential customer lead.

events.name: MarketAnalysisCompleted
events.description: Indicates the completion of a market analysis for strategic decisions.

commands.name: CreateCampaign
commands.description: Signals the initiation of a new marketing campaign.

commands.name: LaunchCampaign
commands.description: Represents the official launch of a marketing campaign.

commands.name: EndCampaign
commands.description: Indicates the conclusion of a marketing campaign.

commands.name: CreateAd
commands.description: Denotes the creation of a new advertisement for campaigns.

commands.name: PublishAd
commands.description: Marks the publication of an advertisement.

commands.name: GenerateLead
commands.description: Represents the generation of a potential customer lead.

commands.name: CompleteMarketAnalysis
commands.description: Indicates the completion of a market analysis for strategic decisions.

integrationPoints.name: Sales
integrationPoints.description: Integration with sales to track leads generated from campaigns.

integrationPoints.name: CustomerSupport
integrationPoints.description: Integration with customer support to assist leads that converted.
